price: (18) So is one brought up in ornaments while being during conflict unevident[1435] [attributed to Allāh]?
arabic: أَوَمَن يُنَشَّؤُاْ فِي ٱلۡحِلۡيَةِ وَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡخِصَامِ غَيۡرُ مُبِينٖ
footnotes: [1435]- Not "obvious" or "distinct" in an argument.  Or not "seen," i.e., absent from battles.  The reference is to a daughter.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: awaman yunasha-u fī al-ḥil'yati wahuwa fī al-khiṣāmi ghayru mubīnin
